name: Magic Guardian
description:
Welcome to the Soaring Crystals World, where you have to fight the Evil forces. Leverage magic staff, cauldron, or a pair of battle-tested pistols to defeat the Enemy. Do your best in protecting Soaring Crystals World using the unique abilities of characters and the arsenal of a mobile laboratory!
Can YOU hold back three Enemy waves while keeping Soaring Crystals safe and sound?
Go ahead, fight Evil forces!

NEW GENERATION OF TOWER-DEFENSE GAMES
Сreate alchemical charges in the cauldron, cast magic spells with your staff and fight for the Soaring Crystals using a pair of battle-tested pistols. Use your unique character abilities and the arsenal of a mobile laboratory to do everything you can to protect the Crystals!

• Beautiful fantasy World of the Soaring Crystals
Discover an amazingly beautiful magical world hidden in the clouds. In this world, where giant columns of stone and gold are seamlessly connected with the lightness of clouds, you have to fight against realistic orcs, sorcerers and other creatures. Get ready to receive a wave of emotions from each defeated enemy!

• Choose your fighting way
You can choose from the three completely different characters: almost immortal witch, lone ranger, and lizard-alchemist.
Each of them is waiting for their chance to get even with Evil Forces.
Make your choice and become the hero who will fight bravely for the destiny of the universe!

• Convenient duration of game sessions
It’s only you who decides whether to play quick game sessions from five to ten minutes or dive in deeper defending Soaring Crystals to see how much you can accomplish. Magic Guardian is a perfect fit if you want to blow off some steam and kill some monster that looks like virtually… whatever option you have. Or if you want to explore the world of VR games and don't know where to start from, don’t hesitate and explore the magic world of Soaring Crystals in Magic Guardian.
